mapper.insert: insert into novel_book (book_id, book_name, book_url, book_old_price, book_new_price) values (#{bookId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bookName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bookUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bookOldPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bookNewPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select book_id, book_name, book_url, book_old_price, book_new_price from novel_book
